channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 12:25 The threat of artobrats in Nikopol and the Nikopol Territorial Community. Watch for further messages.
item.description: 🟢 12:25 The threat of artobrats in Nikopol and the Nikopol Territorial Community. Watch for further messages. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
